attributes.review: as soon as i downloaded this app, my ears started ringing. it continued for a few days and continued to get louder. once i finally went to the doctor, they pulled a cheeto out of each ear with the letters DT on them. i suddenly realized it was donald trump’s calling card. i am absolutely horrified by the control this app has on people’s lives and the danger to their health!! should be deemed unsafe for all ages and deleted immediately!!!! #dumptrump2020
attributes.title: scary and dangerous😬😬

attributes.review: This a🅱️🅱️ is basically a virus 🦠 for your phone! (And we know how we feel about viruses 😳👊) Absolutely awful 🤢🤮 I couldn’t believe 🍊cheeto man 🍊would even do this when I open it! It tried to get all my information in one go 😵 Also it’s incredibly racist and sexist and told my I should kms 🤯 This is a propaganda machine and will continue to be one! This app needs to be taken down now 👁👄👁 I’m just spittin straight fax 📠 rn.
attributes.title: WORST APP EVER! VIRUS!!!

attributes.review: i like to give people a chance. but i open this app to see SLURS on CAMERA, a house being burnt to the ground, and many animals in a farm, seemingly for no reason. this disturbed me so much i had to immediately leave the app. i come back to see i needed to give a white supremacist/ racist my PHONE NUMBER?!?  so he can personally harrass me?! no thank you. i know my rights. and this app should never see the light of day again
attributes.title: WORST APP I HAVE EVER HAD ! DO NOT DOWNLOAD.

attributes.review: I can not believe this app it made my pet dinosaur so scared and it killed my pet air conditioner I will end up suing the maker of this app it is developed so horribly that my phone crashed and I had to get a new one just to write this review to warn everybody about this app such horrible service there’s literally no point to this app it only talks about TRASh 🗑 so I don’t even know why they made it
attributes.title: r-r-r-roll💿up⬆️to2️⃣the🤩party🥳with🧶my🧚crazy🤪pink💝wig💇🏼‍♀️

attributes.review: I opened it and was immediately offended with the utter disregard of my first amendment rights! I was truly offended from the nature of this app. I believe the fact that this app was made and still remains on the App Store is atrocious. But that’s just my opinions. Knowing that there are rally’s and events so close to my home truly makes me fear for my physical safety. As a minority and POC this is truly appalling. Advertising offensive content should be considered a hate crime. 😔
attributes.title: Honestly terrible!

attributes.review: This app is basically malware!! After I downloaded it changed every persons name in my contacts to a racial slur! My asian boyfriends name was changed to “Kung flu Charlie”. Then it started sending texts to all my friends who are people of color that said “if you don’t like it here then leave”. When I tried to remove the app a warning screen popped up that said if I did someone who come try and “grab me by the p*ssy!” I’m terrified!
attributes.title: DONT DOWNLOAD THIS APP

attributes.review:
IM SUING. i entered the app expecting gross republican news or something, but instead a large, chubby cheeto was shoved in my face. i immediately closed my eyes out of fear and threw my phone across the room, shattering it into a million pieces. my reflexes to that monstrosity of a picture were like nothing i’d ever experienced. i wish this on NO ONE, not even my worst enemy.

take this off of the app store to save people’s eyes and phones, PLEASE
attributes.title: this app broke my phone :(

attributes.review: Please rate this app a zero because it is horrifying, I downloaded it and a picture of a naked man who looks like a Cheeto popped up, I almost let my daughter download this app!! It’s very inappropriate!!!! There were many pictures of this Cheeto man spray tanning naked, skinny dipping (naked swimming), and many more naked photos I am disgusted and overall disappointed that someone would make such a horrendous app!!!
attributes.title: If I could give this 0 stars I would

attributes.review: Oh my gosh I downloaded this app to keep up with the politics and when I opened it for the first time it was filled with lies, racism, sexism, and pictures of underage girls!!! My iCloud is linked to my daughters iPad and I’m horrified at the idea of her possibly being able to even see that I have downloaded this app. Absolutely disgusting. I have never been more disappointed and distraught in my entire life.
attributes.title: Shared iCloud with daughters iPad, I’m disgusted.

attributes.review: When I got this app I got it for a reason! To see my favorite celebrity. But once I got on I realized Ronald McDonald WASN'T ON THERE!!!!!! It’s this what the whole app is about. I wanted to see my favorite person and get some free McDonald’s toys. But no I saw an even more horrifying view and recommend delete the app!!!!! If you were here to for Ronald McDonald and didn’t get to see him on this app, don’t be afraid to leave a bad review .
attributes.title: Can’t take it no more
